title: Laura Ingraham calls on Taylor Swift to perform at Trump inauguration
shortDescription: Fox News host Laura Ingraham called on international popstar Taylor Swift to perform at President-elect Donald Trump’s inauguration in January.

title: Trudeau, Canadian officials meet to discuss Trump's tariff threat
shortDescription: Trump's pledge to impose steep tariffs on Canada and Mexico is raising fears of a trade war between the US and two of its biggest trading partners.

title: Jimmy Carter to miss Trump inauguration for health reasons
shortDescription: This will be the second inauguration missed by the 100-year-old former president. Other living ex-presidents have yet to announce their plans.

title: Dr. Oz's stock holdings pose controversy
shortDescription: Dr. Mehmet Oz is President-elect Donald Trump's pick to run the Centers for Medicare and Medicare Services.

title: White House: Many drones are manned aircraft; NJ officials disagree
shortDescription: National security adviser John Kirby said that the White House hasn't been able to corroborate ‘any of the reported (drone) sightings.'

title: Amazon gives $1 million to Trump inauguration fund
shortDescription: Tech giant Amazon joins Meta in donating $1 million to President-elect Trump's inauguration fund. It also will air the Jan. 20 event on Prime Video.

title: Ex-FBI informant agrees to plead guilty to lying about Bidens
shortDescription: Alexander Smirnov reached the agreement with U.S. Department of Justice Special Counsel David Weiss, according to a court filing on Thursday.

title: Democrats split on whether they plan to attend Trump's inauguration
shortDescription: Democrats in Congress are not in consensus about attending next January's ceremony. Also, former presidents have been quiet on the question.

title: Who's next after Biden's single-day record act of clemency?
shortDescription: Biden made history by commuting 1,500 sentences but still faces calls to clear federal death row and issue blanket pardons ahead of Trump's arrival.

title: Audio de Trump sobre legalización de indocumentados de 2017 | Hechos
shortDescription: Esta noticia sobre Trump y una posible legalización de inmigrantes indocumentados no es actual; fue transmitida en 2017.

title: Takeaways: Trump touts his kids as MAGA heirs in Time interview
shortDescription: Trump voiced vaccine skepticism and complained about Project 2025.

title: Mark Zuckerberg's Meta donates $1 million to Trump inauguration
shortDescription: The donation is the latest move by Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to smooth relations with Trump.

title: No FBI informants were sent into the Capitol on Jan. 6: DOJ report
shortDescription: The Justice Department inspector general outlined the FBI’s use of confidential sources ahead of the Jan. 6, 2021 attack in a report issued Thursday.

title: Biden signs FAFSA deadline law; next up, anti-hazing bill
shortDescription: College students may soon benefit from two new bipartisan federal laws. One makes the FAFSA available earlier; the other curbs campus hazing.

title: Biden pardons 39 people: See the full list of names released Thursday
shortDescription: With just over a month left in the White House, Biden commuted 1,500 sentences and issued 39 pardons.
